channel.title: Events on Oxford Chinese Life Scientists Society
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Oxford Chinese Life Scientists Society

item.description: The Programme for the 26th Annual Conference of the Chinese Life Scientists Society in the UK 8:30 am (British Summer Time) 19th, September 2020 Zoom meeting online OPENING SESSION 08:30 – 08:40 Opening remarks - Prof. Hua Ye (Associate Professor in Engineering Science, Deputy Director of CRMI Technology Centre, University of Oxford) 08:40 – 08:50 Speech from the special guest - Mr. Sunan Jiang (Minister Counsellor for Science and Technology Affairs, Chinese Embassy in the UK)
